page.title: 09COMMUNITY LIFE (3)
page.content:
{BMX IN NEW HARTLEY. Nearly every boy aged between{9} and{15}in New Hartley has a{BMX bike. The bikes range in price up to{Â£350. Most of the New Hartley BMXers do {Freestyle}riding around the streets although a few go to{Cramlington New {Town}BMX track (about 5 miles away). Others prefer{Shelley's Farm}where there are some home-made jumps and track.
{CHURCHES} There are 2 churches: Catholic and Methodist. About 150 people attend the Catholic Church every week. There is no Anglican Church - these people worship in the nearby villages of {Seaton Sluice}or{Seaton Delaval.
